Question:
Since the 1970s, the ______ backhand has had a spike in popularity and is now more widely taught.     
A) One-handed     
B) Two-handed     
C) No-handed     
D) Switch-handed

When is the referee usually seen on court during a tournament?    
A) During the coin toss    
B) When players are warming up    
C) During the administration of a medical timeout    
D) After every point played

According to the ITF regulations, official competitions for children aged 10 and under should be played on courts of what size? 
A) 18 m long by 6.4 m wide 
B) 20 m long by 6.4 m wide 
C) 18 m long by 8 m wide 
D) 20 m long by 8 m wide

The "Hawk-Eye" system replaced which device for serve detection? 
A) NetCam 
B) Cyclops 
C) BallCam 
D) Speed gun

Which type of court surface is topspin more effectively used on? 
A) Grass courts due to their slick surface. 
B) Hard courts because of their uniform bounce. 
C) Clay courts because of the slower, higher bounce. 
D) Carpet courts due to their fast speed.
